Package net.minecraft.advancements

Record Class Criterion<T extends CriterionTriggerInstance>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
net.minecraft.advancements.Criterion<T extends net.minecraft.advancements.CriterionTriggerInstance>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of trigger instance that completes this criterion.
public final record Criterion(CriterionTrigger<T> trigger, T triggerInstance)  extends Record
Represents a criteria instance for an Advancement.
